      • rebuildMessageAsNew

        public org.springframework.amqp.core.Message rebuildMessageAsNew(org.springframework.amqp.core.Message successMessage)
        This will recreate a already existing message as a new message to requeue and set the content type as JSON.

        most likely it(message) has failed in the first attempt.

        Parameters:
        successMessage - Message RabbitMQ
        Returns:
        Message

      • addResponseToMessageBody

        public org.springframework.amqp.core.Message addResponseToMessageBody(org.springframework.amqp.core.Message message,
                                                                      com.mashape.unirest.http.JsonNode response)
        When a message is provided, as well as a jsonNode (a response) it will add the response to the message body.

        This message will be used only to push a message to a success queue.

        Parameters:
        message - Message RabbitMQ
        response - JsonNode as the response
        Returns:
        Message
